title: Home
content: Welcome to our wedding website! We, Shaina & David, invite you to join us as we say "I do" under the enchanting Irish sky in County Waterford. Set against the backdrop of rolling hills and mystical shores, our wedding on Friday, 7th March 2025, promises to be a tapestry of cherished moments and everlasting love. Let's come together to celebrate the start of our new chapter in the most magical of settings.
